hero.description: Craft the perfect workout plan tailored to your goals.

features.title: How <1>FitWizard</1> Works
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create the perfect workout plan, all in one place.

smart_goals.title: Smart Goal Setting
smart_goals.description: Choose strength, hypertrophy, or general fitness goals

benefits: Science-backed periodization tailored to your specific goal
Automatic volume and intensity adjustment as you progress
Choose from strength, hypertrophy, or general fitness tracks
detail.how_it_works: Tell us your goal, and our algorithm builds a program using proven training principles. Want strength? We program lower reps with higher intensity. Chasing muscle growth? Optimal volume with progressive overload built in. Prefer general fitness? A balanced approach that covers all your bases.
detail.example: For hypertrophy, we program 10-20 sets per muscle group per week, with rep ranges of 8-12 and strategic RIR (Reps in Reserve) progression to maximize muscle stimulus while managing fatigue.

equipment.title: Equipment Matching
equipment.description: Plans tailored to your available equipment

benefits: No wasted exercises — every movement matches what you have
Seamlessly switch between home and gym workouts
Smart alternatives suggested when equipment isn't available
detail.how_it_works: Select your available equipment — from a full commercial gym to just a pair of dumbbells — and we filter our extensive exercise library to only show movements you can actually perform. Traveling? Update your equipment and get an instant program adjustment.
detail.example: Training at home with dumbbells only? We'll swap barbell bench press for dumbbell press, and leg press for goblet squats and lunges — same muscle groups, different tools.

pdf_export.title: PDF Export
pdf_export.description: Download and share your personalized plan

benefits: Take your workout anywhere — no internet required
Print-friendly format perfect for gym sessions
Share your plan with workout partners or coaches
detail.how_it_works: One click generates a beautifully formatted PDF with your complete workout plan, including exercises, sets, reps, rest periods, and coaching cues. Perfect for offline training or keeping a physical copy at your gym.
detail.example: Heading to a gym with no phone signal? Export your plan before you go and have every detail at your fingertips, from warm-up to cooldown.

trainer_mode.title: Trainer Mode
trainer_mode.description: Manage clients and assign customized plans

benefits: Manage multiple clients from a single dashboard
Create and assign customized plans in minutes
Track client progress and workout adherence over time
detail.how_it_works: Switch to Trainer Mode to unlock the coach dashboard. Add clients, generate personalized plans based on their individual goals and equipment, and monitor their workout completion. Add private notes only you can see.
detail.example: Managing 10 clients? Create unique programs for each based on their goals — strength for Alex, hypertrophy for Sam, general fitness for Jordan — all from one intuitive interface.

features.no_credit_card: No credit card required • Start building your plan in seconds

toast.success_description: Your personalized workout program is ready.
toast.error_description: Failed to generate plan. Please try again.

goal.experience_subtitle: This determines training volume and complexity

hypertrophy.label: Muscle Growth
hypertrophy.description: Maximize muscle size with moderate loads and higher volume

general.label: General Fitness
general.description: Balanced approach for overall health and conditioning

schedule.title: Set your schedule
schedule.subtitle: How often and how long can you train?

maintenance.low: You're below a maintenance-friendly volume. Aim for about {{min}}-{{max}} hours/week.
maintenance.target: You're in a maintenance-friendly range at about {{hours}} hours/week.
maintenance.high: You're above a maintenance-focused volume. {{min}}-{{max}} hours/week is usually enough.

strength.target: Solid strength volume at about {{hours}} hours/week.
strength.high: That's a high strength volume; prioritize recovery if you stay above {{max}} hours.

hypertrophy.low: For muscle growth, aim for about {{min}}-{{max}} hours/week.
hypertrophy.target: You're in a muscle-building range at about {{hours}} hours/week.
hypertrophy.high: That's a high growth volume; make sure recovery supports {{hours}} hours/week.

export_dialog.privacy_notice_text: PDFs may contain metadata. Avoid sharing workout plans containing personal health information publicly.

plan.motivational_quote: Consistency beats perfection. You've got this!

header.logo_tooltip: Your path to peak fitness potential

notfound.title: Looks Like You've Gone Off-Track
notfound.description: This page doesn't exist, or maybe it's resting between sets. Let's get you back on your workout plan!

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page.

role.title: How will you use FitWizard?
role.description: Choose your path — you can always change this later in settings.

frequency_low.title: Low Training Frequency
frequency_low.context: For {{goal}} goals, 3+ days/week is recommended for optimal progress.

missing_legs.title: No Leg Exercises
missing_legs.context: Skipping lower body can lead to muscular imbalances and reduced caloric burn.

imbalance_push.title: Push Dominant
imbalance_push.context: Consider adding back/bicep exercises to balance your pressing movements.

equip_strength.title: Limited Resistance
equip_strength.context: Building max strength is harder with bodyweight only. Consider adding bands or weights if possible.

medical.title: Medical Disclaimer
medical.warning_text: FitWizard is NOT a doctor. The generated workouts are for educational purposes only.
medical.content_p1: The content provided by FitWizard, including workout plans, nutritional suggestions, and chat responses, is for educational and entertainment purposes only and is not intended as medical advice.
medical.content_p2: Always consult a qualified healthcare professional before starting any new exercise program, especially if you have pre-existing health conditions, injuries, or concerns.
medical.content_p3: By using FitWizard, you acknowledge that you are responsible for your own health decisions and that the creators of this application are not liable for any injuries or health issues that may result from following generated workout plans.

privacy.title: Local-First Privacy Policy
privacy.data_stays_text: We do not store your health data on our servers. It lives 100% on your device.
privacy.what_we_store_text: Your workout preferences, generated plans, and any personal notes you add are stored in your browser's local storage. This data never leaves your device unless you explicitly export it.
privacy.analytics_text: We use anonymous, privacy-respecting analytics to understand how the app is used. No personal health data is ever transmitted.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance_text: By accessing and using FitWizard, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
terms.use_text: Permission is granted to use FitWizard for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license does not include the right to modify, distribute, or create derivative works.

footer.educational: Generated plans are for educational purposes only.
